name: Zap2It
description: The new Zap2It TV Listings grid is built on React with a custom flux implementaiton utilizing Backbone.

name: ShipBob
description: A Y-Combinator startup that offers on-demain ship-n-pack as a service. I was charged with building their responsive marketing site to help bring in new customers.

name: AJ Capital Partners
description: Client portal developed on Ruby on Rails, with accompanying single-page brochure site.

name: SpendOut
description: I lead front end development for this expense tracking SaaS application built on AngularJS, Browserify and Gulp.

name: Chicago Interactive Marketing Association
description: Migration from Drupal to WordPress with integrations to Eventbrite, Facebook & Braintree.

name: Space By Doejo
description: A brochure site and blog for a Doejo-owned co-working space in River North, Chicago.

name: Soulsight
description: A portfolio site and blog for a branding and design firm with high profile clients.

name: Drink N Dev Hackathon
description: A one-page site and registration page built for Doejo's annual hackathon event, which I also started and ran for two years.

name: Chicago Athletic Clubs
description: I rebuilt and relaunched a responsive redesign to better meet the needs of the CAC's on-the-go members.

name: Rock-it Ships
description: Rock-it Ships is a musician-tranport business offering a green altnative to bands on the road. I did their branding and WordPress site.
